string.value: Master Rho doesn't seem like he's ready to hand over the new song even though you've already paid the fee. Why is he so hesitant? Ask #bMaestro Rho#k if everything is okay.

Spirit of Rock is playing Maestro Rho's music without proper approval. Defeat Spirit of Rock and listen to the last song he plays.\r\n\r\nIt is highly recommended that you turn up the volume a bit in the system options so you don't miss any important parts of the song while you're listening.
You have destroyed Spirit of Rock as Maestro Rho requested. But he's still reluctant to let go of his Composition Notes. You don't have much time left. Ask #bMaestro Rho#k for the new song.

Oh no. My new song... My new song is getting dirty. Filthy. Defiled!\r\n#L0##bWhat are you talking about? How is your new song getting dirty? And shouldn't you hand me those Composition Notes you promised?#l\n#k

Spirit of Rock somewhere in Kerning City is playing my song without permission! He's ruining it, too. If this continues, Blake could be accused of plagiarizing.\r\n#L0##bPlagiarizing? No way! That Spirit of Rock or whoever, I'll go teach him a lesson! I hate people who illegally access content that doesn't belong to them.#l\n#k

Grr. Spirit of Rock is probably hiding somewhere. Someplace neglected, where people don't visit frequently, like a construction site. You can probably ask June, the public service worker in Kerning City, where Spirit of Rock is.

Find #rSpirit of Rock#k and destroy him. You must also collect #bSpirit of Rock's Music Score#k. We may not be able to read his music score, so you must also pay close attention to what his playing. #bI suggest you turn up the volume in your system options so you can really listen to Spirit of Rock's most recent song.#k
But I can't just give you a song for free.
You've defeated Spirit of Rock! Let me see his music score.

Just as expected. I can't read his music score. Do you happen to remember the last piece Spirit of Rock was playing? I suppose I should give you my Composition Notes even if you can't remember the song, but... Wait, where did my notes go?
Please defeat #rSpirit of Rock#k and bring me #b1 Spirit of Rock's Music Score#k. You must remember the last song he plays when he dies.
Please defeat #rSpirit of Rock#k and bring me #b1 Spirit of Rock's Music Score#k. You must remember the last song he plays when he dies.
